Distinguished/VBN Provincial/JJ at/IN Paris,/NN and/CC Eve/NNP and/CC David./NNP The/DT action/NN in/IN Scenes/NNP From/IN A/DT Courtesan’s/NNP Life/NNP commences/VBZ directly/RB after/IN the/DT end/NN of/IN Eve/NNP and/CC David./NNP DEDICATION/NN To/TO His/PRP$ Highness/NN Prince/NNP Alfonso/NNP Serafino/NNP di/FW Porcia./NNP Allow/VB me/PRP to/TO place/VB your/PRP$ name/NN at/IN the/DT beginning/NN of/IN an/DT essentially/RB Parisian/JJ work,/NN thought/VBD out/RP in/IN your/PRP$ house/NN during/IN these/DT latter/JJ days./NN Is/VBZ it/PRP not/RB natural/JJ that/IN I/PRP should/MD offer/VB you/PRP the/DT flowers/NNS of/IN rhetoric/NN that/IN blossomed/VBD in/IN your/PRP$ garden,/NN watered/VBD with/IN the/DT regrets/NNS I/PRP suffered/VBD from/IN home-sickness,/NN which/WDT you/PRP soothed,/VBP as/IN I/PRP wandered/VBD under/IN the/DT boschetti/NN whose/WP$ elms/NNS reminded/VBD me/PRP of/IN the/DT Champs-Elysees?/NN Thus,/NN perchance,/NN may/MD I/PRP expiate/VB the/DT crime/NN of/IN having/VBG dreamed/VBN of/IN Paris/NNP under/IN the/DT shadow/NN of/IN the/DT Duomo,/NN of/IN having/VBG longed/VBN for/IN our/PRP$ muddy/JJ streets/NNS on/IN the/DT clean/JJ and/CC elegant/JJ flagstones/NNS of/IN Porta-Renza./NNP When/WRB I/PRP have/VB some/DT book/NN to/TO publish/VB which/WDT may/MD be/VB dedicated/VBN to/TO a/DT Milanese/NNP lady,/NN I/NN shall/MD have/VB the/DT happiness/NN of/IN finding/VBG names/NNS already/RB dear/RB to/TO your/PRP$ old/JJ Italian/JJ romancers/NNS among/IN those/DT of/IN women/NNS whom/WP we/PRP love,/VBP and/CC to/TO whose/WP$ memory/NN I/PRP would/MD beg/VB you/PRP to/TO recall/VB your/PRP$ sincerely/RB affectionate/JJ DE/NN BALZAC./NN July/NNP 1838./CD SCENES/NNS FROM/IN A/DT COURTESAN’S/NN LIFE/NN ESTHER/NNP HAPPY;/NNP unexpected/JJ circumstances./NN The/DT secret/NN of/IN this/DT behavior,/NN now/RB dilatory/JJ and/CC again/RB hurried,/RB is/VBZ known/VBN only/RB to/TO old/JJ women/NNS and/CC to/TO certain/JJ experienced/JJ loungers./NN In/IN this/DT immense/JJ assembly/NN the/DT crowd/NN does/VBZ not/RB trouble/NN itself/PRP much/RB to/TO watch/VB the/DT crowd;/NN each/DT one’s/NNS interest/NN is/VBZ impassioned,/NN and/CC even/RB idlers/NNS are/VBP preoccupied./VBN The/DT young/JJ dandy/JJ was/VBD so/RB much/JJ absorbed/VBN in/IN his/PRP$ anxious/JJ quest/NN that/IN he/PRP did/VBD not/RB of/IN Madame/NNP Chatelet,/NNP nee/NN Negrepelisse/NNP d’Espard,”/NNP said/VBD Lucien/NNP quickly./NNP “Since/VB you/PRP recognize/VB me,/NN I/PRP cannot/VBP puzzle/NN you;/NN and/CC I/PRP could/MD never/RB tell/VB you/PRP how/WRB much/JJ you/PRP puzzle/VBP me,”/NN said/VBD the/DT Marquise/NNP d’Espard,/NNP amazed/VBD at/IN the/DT coolness/NN and/CC impertinence/NN to/TO which/WDT the/DT man/NN had/VBD risen/VBN whom/WP she/PRP had/VBD formerly/RB despised./NN “Then/NN allow/VBP me,/NN madame,/NN to/TO preserve/VB my/PRP$ only/JJ chance/NN of/IN occupying/VBG your/PRP$ thoughts/NNS by/IN is,/VBD I/PRP should/MD be/VB twice/RB as/IN rich,”/NN replied/VBD the/DT fine/JJ gentleman,/NN in/IN a/DT light/NN but/CC meaning/VBG tone,/NN expressive/JJ of/IN keen/JJ raillery./NN “No!”/NNP a/DT grasp/NN of/IN iron/NN which/WDT he/PRP could/MD not/RB shake/VB off./NNS “You/NN young/JJ cockerel,/NN hatched/VBN in/IN Mother/NNP Vauquer’s/NNP coop--you,/NN whose/WP$ heart/NN failed/VBN safety,/NN that/WDT if/IN you/PRP do/VBP not/RB treat/VB Lucien/NNP like/IN the/DT brother/NN you/PRP love,/VBP you/PRP are/VBP in/IN our/PRP$ power,/NN while/IN we/PRP are/VBP not/RB in/IN yours./NN Silence/NN and/CC submission!/NN or/CC I/PRP shall/MD join/VB your/PRP$ game/NN and/CC upset/VB the/DT skittles./NNP Lucien/NNP de/IN Rubempre/NNP is/VBZ under/IN the/DT protection/NN of/IN the/DT strongest/JJS power/NN of/IN the/DT day--the/JJ Church./NNP Choose/VB between/IN life/NN and/CC death--Answer.”/NN Rastignac/NNP felt/VBD giddy,/NN like/IN a/DT man/NN who/WP has/VBZ slept/VBN in/IN de/NNP Rubempre’s/NNS fortune:/VBP She/PRP is/VBZ des/FW Lupeaulx’s/FW former/JJ ‘rat.’”/NN A/DT form/NN of/IN dissipation,/NN now/RB forgotten,/RB but/CC still/RB customary/JJ at/IN the/DT or/CC twelve/CD in/IN the/DT chorus/NN of/IN some/DT theatre,/RB more/RBR particularly/RB at/IN the/DT opera,/NN who/WP was/VBD trained/VBN by/IN young/JJ roues/NNS to/TO vice/NN and/CC infamy./NN of/IN La/NNP Torpille?”/NNP asked/VBD a/DT gloomy/JJ voice/NN that/WDT struck/VBD to/TO his/PRP$ vitals,/NN for/IN it/PRP was/VBD no/RB longer/JJR disguised./NN “_He_/NN again--he/NN has/VBZ made/VBN two/CD months,/NN tortured/JJ by/IN a/DT fever/NN of/IN impatience,/NN and/CC in/IN a/DT state/NN like/IN that/DT produced/VBN by/IN acute/JJ home-sickness,/NN the/DT Baron,/NN amazed/VBN to/TO together./NN Peyrade,/NN happy/JJ at/IN having/VBG discerned/VBN Corentin’s/NNPS superior/JJ abilities,/NN had/VBD started/VBN him/PRP in/IN his/PRP$ career/NN by/IN preparing/VBG a/DT success/NN for/IN him./NN He/PRP obliged/VBD his/PRP$ disciple/NN to/TO make/VB use/NN of/IN a/DT mistress/NN who/WP had/VBD scorned/VBN him/PRP as/IN a/DT bait/NN to/TO catch/VB a/DT man/NN (see/JJ _The/NN Chouans_)./NNP And/CC Corentin/NNP at/IN that/DT time/NN was/VBD hardly/RB five-and-twenty./JJ Corentin,/NN who/WP had/VBD been/VBN retained/VBN as/IN one/CD of/IN the/DT generals/NNS of/IN whom/WP qvite/NN frankly.”/NN “Frankly--that/NN is/VBZ all/DT I/PRP ask,”/VBP said/VBD Peyrade,/NN “and/NN frankness/NN is/VBZ the/DT only/RB thing/NN at/IN all/DT new/JJ that/IN you/PRP and/CC I/PRP can/MD offer/VB to/TO each/DT other.”/NN “Frankly,”/NN echoed/VBD the/DT Baron./NNP “Vere/NNP shall/MD I/PRP put/VB you/PRP down.”/VBP “At/VB the/DT corner/NN of/IN the/DT Pont/NNP Louis/NNP XVI.”/NNP “To/NN to/TO sent/VBN you/PRP to-morrow/VB some/DT chewels/NNS as/IN a/DT soufenir/NN of/IN de/FW Baron/NNP von/NN Nucingen.”/NN “Don’t/NN know/VBP him!”/NN said/VBD she,/NN laughing/NN like/IN a/DT crazy/JJ knew/VBD what/WP was/VBD meant/VBN by/IN the/DT police,/NNP he/PRP did!--pulled/VBD up/RP in/IN the/DT middle/NN of/IN a/DT wood./NN The/DT Baron/NNP had/VBD the/DT handkerchief/NN off,/NN and/CC of/IN the/DT Bourse.”/NN “My/NN fortune/NN depends----”/NN “On/VB your/PRP$ appearing/VBG to/TO lose/VB it,”/NN said/VBD Barker./NNP “Sir!”/NN cried/VBD Cerizet./NNP “Look/NN here,/RB my/PRP$ dear/RB “I/NN will/MD go/VB and/CC give/VB the/DT creditor/NN a/DT good/JJ laugh,”/NN said/VBD Asie,/NN “and/NN he/PRP will/MD give/VB me/PRP something/NN for/IN a/DT treat/NN to-day.--We/NN bear/NN no/DT remained/VBD alone/RB with/IN him/PRP in/IN the/DT drawing-room,/JJ whither,/NN half/PDT an/DT hour/NN later,/VBD the/DT cashier/NN came,/NN followed/VBN by/IN Contenson./NNP Esther/NNP then/RB reappeared/VBD in/IN a/DT bewitching,/NN though/IN improvised,/JJ costume./NN When/WRB the/DT money/NN had/VBD been/VBN counted/VBN by/IN Louchard,/NN the/DT Baron/NNP wished/VBD to/TO examine/VB the/DT bills;/NN but/CC Esther/NNP snatched/VBD them/PRP with/IN a/DT cat-like/JJ grab,/NN and/CC carried/VBD them/PRP away/RB to/TO her/PRP$ desk./NN “What/NN will/MD you/PRP give/VB the/DT rabble?”/NN said/VBD Contenson/NNP to/TO Nucingen./NNP “You/NN hafe/NN not/RB shown/VBN much/JJ consideration,”/NN said/VBD the/DT Baron./NNP “And/NN what/WDT about/IN my/PRP$ leg?”/NN cried/VBD Contenson./NNP “Louchard,/NNP you/PRP shall/MD gife/VB ein/NN hundert/JJ francs/NNS to/TO Contenson/NNP out/IN of/IN the/DT change/NN of/IN the/DT tousand-franc/JJ note.”/NN “De/NN lady/NN is/VBZ a/DT but/CC on/IN the/DT boulevard/NN Asie,/NN who/WP was/VBD looking/VBG out/RP for/IN him,/NN stopped/VBD Louchard./NNP “The/NN bailiff/NN and/CC the/DT creditor/NN are/VBP there/EX in/IN a/DT cab,”/NN like.--Dat/NN is/VBZ too/RB silly!/JJ but,/NN happily,/NN nobody/NN shall/MD hafe/VB known/JJ it!”/NN said/VBD he/PRP to/TO himself/PRP three/CD weeks/NNS after./IN And/CC he/PRP made/VBD great/JJ incongruities/NNS to/TO whom/WP the/DT name/NN of/IN Genius/NN is/VBZ given,/NN and/CC which,/NN if/IN we/PRP only/RB could/MD see/VB them,/RB would/MD look/VB like/IN deformities./NNP The/DT same/JJ triumph.”/NN “Very/NN good,/NN I/PRP will/MD set/VB to/TO work,”/VB said/VBD Asie./NNP “And/NNP you/PRP may/MD come,/VB monsieur,”/NN she/PRP added/VBD respectfully./NN “You/NN will/MD find/VB banker,/NN rubbing/VBG his/PRP$ hands./NN And/CC after/IN seeing/VBG the/DT horrible/JJ mulatto/JJ out/IN of/IN the/DT house,/NN he/PRP said/VBD to/TO himself:/NN “How/NN vise/NN it/PRP is/VBZ to/TO hafe/VB much/JJ money.”/NN He/PRP sprang/VBD out/IN of/IN bed,/NN went/VBD down/RB to/TO his/PRP$ office,/NN and/CC resumed/VBD the/DT conduct/NN of/IN his/PRP$ immense/JJ business/NN with/IN a/DT you/PRP please,”/VBP said/VBD Esther,/NN “if/NN only/RB you/PRP will/MD be/VB so/RB kind/RB as/IN to/TO call/VB my/PRP$ cook/NN Asie,/NN and/CC Eugenie/NNP Europe./NNP I/PRP have/VBP given/VBN those/DT names/NNS to/TO all/PDT the/DT women/NNS who/WP have/VBP served/VBN me/PRP ever/RB since/IN the/DT first/JJ two./NN I/PRP do/VBP not/RB love/VB change----”/NN “Asie,/NN Europe!”/NN echoed/VBD the/DT Baron,/NN laughing./NN “How/NN ver’/RB droll/JJ you/PRP are.--You/NN hafe/VB infentions.--I/NN should/MD hafe/VB eaten/VBN many/JJ dinners/NNS before/IN I/PRP should/MD hafe/VB call’/VB a/DT cook/NN Asie.”/NN “It/NN is/VBZ our/PRP$ business/NN to/TO be/VB droll,”/NN said/VBD Esther./NNP “Come,/NNP now,/NN may/MD not/RB a/DT poor/JJ girl/NN be/VB fed/VBN by/IN Asia/NNP and/CC dressed/VBN “Europe,/NNP my/PRP$ girl,/NN I/PRP want/VBP my/PRP$ bonnet,”/NN said/VBD Esther./NNP “I/NNP must/MD have/VB a/DT black/JJ silk/NN bonnet/NN lined/VBD with/IN pink/NN and/CC trimmed/VBD with/IN try/VB to/TO make/VB an/DT Englishman/NNP happy./NNP They/PRP are/VBP all/DT cold/JJ and/CC selfish--pigs/NNS on/IN their/PRP$ hind/JJ legs.”/NN “What,/NNP no/DT consideration?”/NN said/VBD Esther/NNP with/IN a/DT smile./NN “On/VB the/DT contrary,/NN my/PRP$ dear,/NN the/DT monster/NN has/VBZ never/RB shown/VBN the/DT least/JJS familiarity.”/NN “Under/JJR no/DT circumstances/NNS whatever?”/JJ robbed/VBN of/IN an/DT invention/NN in/IN the/DT paper-making/NN of/IN which/WDT the/DT brothers/NNS Cointet/NNP are/VBP getting/VBG the/DT benefit----”/NN “Ah,/NN to/TO be/VB sure,/VBN the/DT Brothers/NNPS Cointet!”/NNP said/VBD Corentin./NNP “Hold/VB your/PRP$ tongue,”/NN said/VBD the/DT innkeeper./NN “What/NN can/MD it/PRP matter/VB to/TO these/DT gentlemen/NNS whether/IN Monsieur/NNP Sechard/NNP has/VBZ a/DT right/NN or/CC no/DT to/TO a/DT patent/NN for/IN his/PRP$ inventions/NNS in/IN paper-making?--If/NN you/PRP mean/VBP to/TO spend/VB the/DT night/NN here--at/RB the/DT _Belle/JJ Etoile_----”/NN he/PRP went/VBD on,/JJ addressing/VBG the/DT travelers,/NN “here/NN is/VBZ the/DT book,/NN and/CC please/VB to/TO put/VB your/PRP$ names/NNS down./VBP We/PRP have/VBP an/DT Derville/NNP entered/VBD their/PRP$ names/NNS and/CC his/PRP$ profession/NN as/IN attorney/NN to/TO the/DT lower/JJR Court/NN in/IN the/DT department/NN of/IN the/DT Seine,/NN “I/NN fancied/VBD the/DT Sechards/NNPS were/VBD very/RB rich.”/JJ “Some/JJ people/NNS say/VBP they/PRP are/VBP millionaires,”/JJ replied/VBD the/DT innkeeper./NN “But/NN as/IN to/TO hindering/VBG tongues/NNS from/IN wagging,/NN you/PRP might/MD as/RB well/RB try/VB to/TO stop/VB the/DT river/NN from/IN flowing./NNP Old/NNP Sechard/NNP left/VBD two/CD hundred/CD thousand/CD francs’/NN worth/NN of/IN landed/VBN “Monsieur,/NN your/PRP$ father/NN left/VBD an/DT elder/JJR son----”/NN “Oh,/NN the/DT old/JJ rascal!”/NN cried/VBD Courtois./NNP “He/NNP was/VBD never/RB very/RB fond/JJ of/IN you,/NN Monsieur/NNP ‘You/NN shall/MD see/VB what/WP you/PRP shall/MD see/VB when/WRB I/PRP am/VBP under/IN the/DT turf.’”/NN “Do/NN not/RB be/VB dismayed,/JJ monsieur,”/NN said/VBD Corentin/NNP to/TO Sechard,/NNP be/VB dismayed,/JJ madame,”/NN Corentin/NNP went/VBD on,/JJ seeing/VBG amazement/NN written/VBN on/IN Madame/NNP Sechard’s/NNP handsome/JJ features,/NN “it/NN is/VBZ only/RB a/DT natural/JJ son./NN “Old/JJ Sechard?--Millions?”/NN said/VBD Courtois./NNP “Who/NNP on/IN earth/NN told/VBD you/PRP that?/IN Some/DT peasant----”/NN “Monsieur,”/NNP said/VBD Cachan,/NNP “you/NNP are/VBP not/RB attached/VBN to/TO the/DT Treasury?/NNP You/PRP may/MD be/VB told/VBN all/PDT the/DT facts----”/NN “Be/NN quite/RB easy,”/JJ said/VBD Corentin,/NNP “I/NNP give/VB you/PRP my/PRP$ word/NN of/IN honor/NN I/PRP am/VBP not/RB employed/VBN by/IN the/DT Treasury.”/NN Cachan,/NN who/WP had/VBD just/RB signed/VBN to/TO everybody/NN to/TO say/VB nothing,/JJ gave/VBD expression/NN to/TO his/PRP$ monsieur,/NN old/JJ Sechard/NNP left/VBD twenty/CD acres/NNS of/IN vineyard,/NN five/CD small/JJ farms,/NN ten/CD acres/NNS of/IN meadowland/NN here,/NN and/CC not/RB a/DT sou/NN besides----”/NN told/VBD me/PRP you/PRP shammed/VBD Englishman/NNP better/JJR than/IN he/PRP could,/VB and/CC I/PRP would/MD not/RB believe/VB him,”/NN said/VBD Rastignac./NN “Some/NN bankrupt/JJ caught/VBN in/IN that/WDT dangerous/JJ weapon,/IN the/DT Malay/NNP kris.--At/NN least,/NN so/IN it/PRP is/VBZ reported.”/JJ The/DT Police/NNP Commissioner/NNP presently/RB arrived;/NNP Corentin/NNP told/VBD him/PRP his/PRP$ suspicions,/NN and/CC begged/VBD him/PRP to/TO draw/VB up/RP a/DT report,/JJ telling/VBG him/PRP where/WRB and/CC with/IN whom/WP Peyrade/NNP had/VBD supped,/NN and/CC the/DT causes/NNS of/IN the/DT state/NN in/IN which/WDT he/PRP found/VBN Lydie./NN Corentin/NNP then/RB went/VBD to/TO Lydie’s/NNP rooms;/NNP Desplein/NNP and/CC Bianchon/NNP had/VBD been/VBN examining/VBG the/DT poor/JJ child./NN He/PRP met/VBD them/PRP at/IN the/DT door./NN “Well,/NN gentlemen?”/NN asked/VBD Corentin./NNP “Place/VB the/DT girl/NN under/IN medical/JJ care;/NN unless/IN she/PRP recovers/VBZ her/PRP$ a/DT cure/NN but/CC in/IN the/DT maternal/JJ instinct,/NN if/IN it/PRP can/MD be/VB aroused.”/IN Corentin/NNP paid/VBD each/DT of/IN the/DT physicians/NNS forty/CD francs/NNS in/IN gold,/NN and/CC then/RB turned/VBN to/TO the/DT Police/NN Commissioner,/NN who/WP had/VBD pulled/VBN him/PRP by/IN the/DT sleeve./NN “The/NN medical/JJ officer/NN insists/VBZ on/IN it/PRP that/IN death/NN was/VBD that/DT priest’s/VBZ gown.”/NN “He/NN is/VBZ no/DT more/JJR a/DT priest/NN than/IN he/PRP is/VBZ a/DT Spaniard,”/NN said/VBD Contenson./NNP “I/NN am/VBP sure/JJ of/IN that,”/NN said/VBD the/DT thought/VBD _Trompe-la-Mort_./NN By/IN seven/CD in/IN the/DT evening/NN this/DT document,/NN written/VBN and/CC sealed,/NN was/VBD placed/VBN by/IN Asie/NNP under/IN Esther’s/NNP bolster./NNP Rubempre,/NNP who/WP had/VBD been/VBN engaged/VBN to/TO Mademoiselle/NNP Clotilde/NNP de/IN Grandlieu,/NNP taken/VBN on/IN the/DT highroad/NN to/TO Italy,/NN close/RB to/TO the/DT little/JJ village/NN of/IN Grez./NNP Both/CC were/VBD charged/VBN as/IN being/VBG concerned/VBN in/IN a/DT murder,/NN of/IN which/WDT the/DT profits/NNS were/VBD stated/VBN at/IN seven/CD millions/NNS of/IN francs;/NN and/CC for/IN some/DT days/NNS the/DT scandal/NN of/IN this/DT trial/NN preponderated/VBN over/IN the/DT absorbing/VBG importance/NN of/IN the/DT last/JJ elections/NNS held/VBD under/IN Charles/NNP X./NNP In/IN the/DT first/JJ place,/NN the/DT charge/NN had/VBD been/VBN based/VBN on/IN an/DT application/NN by/IN the/DT Baron/NNP de/NNP Nucingen;/NNP then,/IN Lucien’s/NNP apprehension,/NNP just/RB as/IN he/PRP was/VBD about/IN to/TO be/VB appointed/VBN private/JJ secretary/NN to/TO the/DT Prime/NNP Minister,/NNP made/VBD a/DT stir/VB in/IN the/DT very/RB highest/JJS circles/NNS of/IN society./NN In/IN every/DT drawing-room/NN in/IN Paris/NNP more/JJR than/IN one/CD young/JJ man/NN could/MD recollect/VB having/VBG envied/VBN Lucien/NNP when/WRB he/PRP was/VBD honored/VBN by/IN the/DT notice/NN of/IN the/DT beautiful/JJ Duchesse/NNP de/IN Maufrigneuse;/NNP and/CC every/DT woman/NN knew/VBD that/IN he/PRP was/VBD the/DT favored/JJ attache/NN of/IN Madame/NNP de/IN Serizy,/NNP the/DT wife/NN of/IN one/CD of/IN the/DT Government/NN bigwigs./NN And/CC finally,/NN his/PRP$ handsome/JJ person/NN gave/VBD him/PRP a/DT singular/JJ notoriety/NN in/IN the/DT various/JJ worlds/NNS that/WDT make/VBP up/RB Paris--the/JJ world/NN of/IN fashion,/NN the/DT financial/JJ world,/NN the/DT world/NN of/IN courtesans,/NN the/DT young/JJ men’s/NNS world,/VBP the/DT literary/JJ world./NN to/TO the/DT vulgar/JJ as/IN the/DT Violon--perhaps/NNS because/IN they/PRP make/VBP a/DT noise/NN there,/IN shrieking/VBG or/CC crying./NN From/IN thence/RB the/DT suspected/VBN persons/NNS (inculpes)/VBP are/VBP taken/VBN before/IN the/DT police/NN commissioner/NN or/CC magistrate,/NN who/WP holds/VBZ a/DT preliminary/JJ inquiry,/NN and/CC can/MD dismiss/VB the/DT case/NN if/IN there/EX remained/VBN in/IN many/JJ districts/NNS and/CC till/IN long/JJ after./JJ This/DT circumstance/NN may/MD give/VB some/DT idea/NN of/IN the/DT narrowness/NN of/IN the/DT Saint-Jean/NNP gate/NN and/CC the/DT ease/NN with/IN which/WDT it/PRP could/MD be/VB blocked./VBN If/IN a/DT cab/NN should/MD be/VB coming/VBG through/IN from/IN the/DT Place/NNP de/IN Greve/NNP while/IN a/DT costermonger-woman/NN women--no/JJ longer/RBR receives/VBZ either/CC suspected/VBN or/CC remanded/VBN criminals/NNS excepting/VBG in/IN rare/JJ cases,/NN as,/NN for/IN instance,/NN in/IN these/DT of/IN Jacques/NNP their/PRP$ time/NN there/RB by/IN an/DT exercise/NN of/IN leniency/NN which,/NN though/IN arbitrary,/NN is/VBZ humane./IN As/IN a/DT rule,/NN suspected/VBN criminals,/JJ whether/IN they/PRP are/VBP to/TO be/VB subjected/VBN to/TO a/DT preliminary/JJ examination--to/JJ “go/NN up,”/NN in/IN the/DT slang/NN of/IN the/DT Courts--or/NN to/TO appear/VB before/IN the/DT magistrate/NN of/IN the/DT for,/NN by/IN orders/NNS from/IN the/DT examining/VBG judge,/NN the/DT Governor/NN treated/VBN him/PRP with/IN some/DT consideration./NN Persons/NNS who/WP have/VBP never/RB had/VBN anything/NN to/TO she/PRP lamented/VBD that/IN such/JJ a/DT handsome/JJ young/JJ fellow,/NN brought/VBD to/TO Paris/NNP by/IN her/PRP$ cousin,/NN Madame/NNP du/NNP Chatelet,/NNP should/MD have/VB turned/VBN out/RP so/RB badly./JJ ‘That,’/NN said/VBD she,/JJ ‘is/NNS what/WDT bad/JJ women/NNS like/IN Coralie/NNP and/CC Esther/NNP bring/VBP young/JJ men/NNS to/TO when/WRB they/PRP are/VBP corrupt/JJ enough/RB to/TO share/NN their/PRP$ disgraceful/JJ profits!’/NNP Next/NNP came/VBD some/DT fine/JJ speeches/NNS about/IN charity/NN and/CC religion!/JJ Madame/NNP du/NNP Chatelet/NNP had/VBD said/VBN that/IN Lucien/NNP deserved/VBD a/DT thousand/CD deaths/NNS for/IN having/VBG half/NN killed/VBD his/PRP$ mother/NN and/CC his/PRP$ sister./NN “Then/NN she/PRP spoke/VBD of/IN a/DT vacancy/NN in/IN the/DT Supreme/NNP Court--she/NN knows/VBZ the/DT Keeper/NN of/IN the/DT Seals./NNP ‘Your/NNP husband,/JJ madame,/NN has/VBZ a/DT fine/JJ opportunity/NN of/IN distinguishing/VBG himself,’/JJ she/PRP said/VBD in/IN conclusion--and/NN that/WDT is/VBZ all.”/IN “We/NN distinguish/VB ourselves/PRP every/DT day/NN when/WRB we/PRP do/VBP our/PRP$ duty,”/NN said/VBD Camusot./NNP “You/NN will/MD go/VB far/RB if/IN you/PRP are/VBP always/RB the/DT lawyer/NN even/RB to/TO your/PRP$ wife,”/NN cried/VBD Madame/NNP Camusot./NNP “Well,/NNP I/PRP used/VBD to/TO think/VB you/PRP a/DT goose./NN Now/RB I/PRP admire/VBP Esther,/NN formerly/RB on/IN the/DT register/NN of/IN the/DT town.”/NN Though/IN these/DT notes/NNS are/VBP to/TO a/DT great/JJ extent/NN a/DT repetition/NN of/IN the/DT story/NN already/RB told,/VB it/PRP was/VBD necessary/JJ to/TO reproduce/VB them/PRP to/TO show/VB the/DT part/NN played/VBN by/IN the/DT police/NN in/IN Paris./NNP As/IN has/VBZ already/RB been/VBN seen/VBN from/IN the/DT proceedings,/NN so/RB does/VBZ the/DT police/NN weigh/VB and/CC measure/VB the/DT honesty/NN of/IN each/DT citizen./NN With/IN it,/NN as/IN in/IN a/DT Court/NN of/IN Law,/NN innocence/NN has/VBZ providence./NN And/CC its/PRP$ discretion/NN is/VBZ equal/JJ to/TO the/DT extent/NN of/IN its/PRP$ power./NNP This/DT vast/JJ mass/NN of/IN written/JJ evidence/NN compiled/VBN by/IN the/DT police--reports,/NN notes,/NN and/CC summaries--an/JJ ocean/NN of/IN information,/NN sleeps/VBZ undisturbed,/NN as/IN deep/JJ and/CC calm/JJ as/IN the/DT sea./NN Some/DT accident/NN occurs,/NN some/DT crime/NN or/CC misdemeanor/NN becomes/VBZ aggressive,--then/JJ the/DT law/NN refers/VBZ to/TO the/DT police,/NN and/CC immediately,/NN if/IN any/DT documents/NNS bear/VBP on/IN the/DT suspected/VBN criminal,/NN the/DT judge/NN is/VBZ informed./NNP These/DT records,/VB an/DT analysis/NN of/IN his/PRP$ antecedents,/NN are/VBP merely/RB side-lights,/JJ and/CC unknown/JJ beyond/IN the/DT walls/NNS of/IN the/DT Palais/NNP de/IN Justice./NNP No/NNP legal/JJ use/NN can/MD be/VB made/VBN of/IN them;/NN Justice/NN is/VBZ informed/VBN by/IN them,/NN and/CC takes/VBZ advantage/NN of/IN them;/NN but/CC that/DT is/VBZ all./RB These/DT documents/NNS form,/VBP as/IN it/PRP were,/VBD the/DT inner/JJ lining/NN of/IN the/DT tissue/NN of/IN crimes,/NN their/PRP$ first/JJ cause,/NN which/WDT is/VBZ everywhere/RB and/CC at/IN all/DT times./JJ There/EX is/VBZ not/RB a/DT magistrate/NN who,/NN after/IN twelve/CD years’/JJ experience/NN in/IN Paris,/NN is/VBZ not/RB fully/RB aware/JJ that/IN the/DT crimes/NNS that/WDT are/VBP committed/VBN are/VBP never/RB punished/VBN by/IN the/DT law./NN If/IN the/DT public/NN could/MD know/VB how/WRB reserved/VBN the/DT _employes_/NN of/IN the/DT police/NN are--who/NN do/VBP not/RB forget--they/JJ would/MD reverence/NN these/DT honest/JJ men/NNS as/RB much/RB as/IN they/PRP do/VBP Cheverus./NNP The/DT police/NN is/VBZ supposed/VBN to/TO be/VB astute,/JJ Machiavellian;/NN it/PRP is,/NN in/IN fact/NN most/RBS benign./JJ But/CC it/PRP hears/VBZ every/DT passion/NN in/IN its/PRP$ paroxysms,/NN it/PRP listens/VBZ to/TO every/DT kind/NN of/IN treachery,/NN and/CC keeps/VBZ notes/NNS of/IN all./JJ The/DT police/NN is/VBZ terrible/JJ on/IN one/CD side/NN only./NN What/WDT it/PRP does/VBZ for/IN justice/NN it/PRP does/VBZ no/RB less/RBR for/IN political/JJ interests;/NN but/CC in/IN these/DT it/PRP is/VBZ as/IN ruthless/JJ and/CC as/IN one-sided/JJ as/IN the/DT fires/NNS of/IN the/DT Inquisition./NNP “Put/NN this/DT aside,”/NN said/VBD the/DT lawyer,/JJ replacing/VBG the/DT notes/NNS in/IN their/PRP$ cover;/NN “this/NN is/VBZ a/DT secret/JJ between/IN the/DT police/NN and/CC the/DT law./JJ The/DT judge/NN will/MD estimate/VB its/PRP$ value,/NN but/CC Monsieur/NNP and/CC Madame/NNP Camusot/NNP must/MD know/VB nothing/NN of/IN it.”/NN “As/NNS if/IN I/PRP needed/VBD telling/VBG that!”/NN said/VBD his/PRP$ wife./NN “Lucien/NN is/VBZ guilty,”/RB he/PRP went/VBD on;/JJ “but/NN of/IN what?”/NN “A/NN man/NN who/WP is/VBZ the/DT favorite/NN of/IN the/DT Duchesse/NNP de/IN Maufrigneuse,/NNP of/IN the/DT Comtesse/NNP de/NNP Serizy,/NNP and/CC loved/VBN by/IN Clotilde/NNP de/IN Grandlieu,/NNP is/VBZ not/RB guilty,”/VB said/VBD Amelie./NNP “The/NNP other/JJ _must_/NN be/VB answerable/JJ for/IN everything.”/NN “But/NNP Lucien/NNP is/VBZ his/PRP$ accomplice,”/NN cried/VBD Camusot./NNP “Take/VB my/PRP$ advice,”/NN said/VBD Amelie./NNP “Restore/NNP this/DT priest/NN to/TO the/DT diplomatic/JJ career/NN he/PRP so/RB greatly/RB adorns,/JJ exculpate/VB this/DT little/JJ wretch,/NN and/CC find/VB some/DT other/JJ criminal----”/NN “How/VB you/PRP run/VB on!”/NN said/VBD the/DT magistrate/NN with/IN a/DT smile./JJ “Women/NN go/VB to/TO the/DT point,/NN plunging/VBG through/IN the/DT law/NN as/IN birds/NNS fly/VBP through/IN the/DT air,/NN and/CC find/VB nothing/NN to/TO stop/VB them.”/IN “But,”/NNP said/VBD Amelie,/NNP “whether/RB he/PRP is/VBZ a/DT diplomate/NN or/CC a/DT convict,/NN the/DT Abbe/NNP Carlos/NNP will/MD find/VB some/DT one/CD to/TO get/VB him/PRP out/IN of/IN the/DT scrape.”/NN “I/NN am/VBP only/RB a/DT considering/VBG cap;/NN you/PRP are/VBP the/DT brain,”/NN said/VBD Camusot./NNP “Well,/VB the/DT sitting/VBG is/VBZ closed;/JJ give/VB your/PRP$ Melie/NN a/DT kiss;/NN it/PRP is/VBZ one/CD o’clock.”/NN And/CC Madame/NNP Camusot/NNP went/VBD to/TO bed,/VB leaving/VBG her/PRP$ husband/NN to/TO arrange/VB his/PRP$ papers/NNS and/CC his/PRP$ ideas/NNS in/IN preparation/NN for/IN the/DT of/IN Parisian/JJ magistrates,/NN to/TO go/VB to/TO his/PRP$ chambers,/NN where/WRB all/PDT the/DT documents/NNS in/IN the/DT case/NN were/VBD laid/VBN ready/JJ for/IN him./NN This/DT was/VBD the/DT be/VB understood/VBN by/IN many/JJ readers/NNS that/IN a/DT man/NN may/MD gladly/RB be/VB the/DT shaft/NN of/IN a/DT machine,/NN while/IN they/PRP wonder/VBP why/WRB he/PRP is/VBZ content/JJ to/TO is/VBZ inconceivable/JJ that/IN such/PDT a/DT clever/JJ young/JJ fellow/NN should/MD compromise/VB his/PRP$ chances/NNS by/IN a/DT perfectly/RB aimless/JJ crime.”/NN “Yes,”/NNP said/VBD Camusot,/NNP she/PRP had/VBD long/RB since/IN come/VBN into,”/NN added/VBD Granville./NN “But/NN then/RB what/WP do/VBP you/PRP suppose/VB is/VBZ the/DT meaning/NN of/IN it/PRP all?”/JJ asked/VBD Camusot./NNP are/VBP any/DT old/JJ stagers/NNS here.”/RB “Why?”/NN “_Trompe-la-Mort_/NN sneaked/VBD their/PRP$ chips,/NN and/CC I/PRP know/VBP that/IN they/PRP have/VBP vowed/VBN to/TO be/VB the/DT death/NN of/IN about/IN half/PDT an/DT hour/NN since,/NN finished/VBD his/PRP$ deep/JJ meditations,/NN and/CC was/VBD armed/VBN for/IN the/DT fray./NNP Nothing/NN is/VBZ more/RBR perfectly/RB characteristic/NN of/IN this/DT type/NN of/IN the/DT mob/NN in/IN rebellion/NN against/IN the/DT law/NN than/IN the/DT few/JJ words/NNS he/PRP had/VBD written/VBN on/IN the/DT greasy/JJ scraps/NNS of/IN paper./NN The/DT sense/NN of/IN the/DT first--for/JJ it/PRP was/VBD written/VBN in/IN the/DT language,/NN the/DT very/RB slang/NN of/IN slang,/NN agreed/VBD upon/IN by/IN Asie/NNP and/CC himself,/VB a/DT cipher/NN of/IN words--was/NNS as/IN follows:--/JJ “Go/NN to/TO the/DT Duchesse/NNP de/IN Maufrigneuse/NNP or/CC Madame/NNP de/IN Serizy:/NNP one/CD of/IN them/PRP must/MD see/VB Lucien/NNP before/IN he/PRP is/VBZ examined,/JJ and/CC give/VB him/PRP the/DT enclosed/VBN paper/NN to/TO read./VB Then/RB find/VB Europe/NNP and/CC Paccard;/NNP those/DT two/CD thieves/NNS must/MD be/VB at/IN my/PRP$ orders,/NN and/CC ready/JJ to/TO play/VB any/DT part/NN I/PRP may/MD set/VBN them./IN “Go/NN to/TO Rastignac;/NN tell/VBP him,/RB from/IN the/DT man/NN he/PRP met/VBD at/IN the/DT opera-ball,/NN to/TO come/VB with/IN Dr./NNP Bianchon,/NNP and/CC get/VB Lucien’s/NNPS two/CD women/NNS to/TO work/VB to/TO the/DT same/JJ end.”/NN On/IN the/DT enclosed/JJ fragment/NN were/VBD these/DT words/NNS in/IN good/JJ with/IN Parisian/JJ women/NNS than/IN might/MD be/VB supposed,/JJ and/CC causes/VBZ the/DT ruin/VB of/IN some/DT virtuous/JJ souls/NNS just/RB as/IN they/PRP are/VBP reaching/VBG the/DT haven/NN of/IN had/VBD come/VBN like/IN the/DT last/JJ trump/NN on/IN this/DT paroxysm/NN of/IN devotion./NN The/DT Countess/NNP had/VBD nearly/RB died/VBN of/IN it./NNP Her/PRP$ husband/NN had/VBD himself/PRP heart./NN She/PRP said/VBD to/TO her/PRP$ husband/NN in/IN her/PRP$ fever:/NN “Save/NN Lucien,/NN and/CC I/PRP will/MD live/VB henceforth/NN for/IN you/PRP alone.”/IN “Indeed,/NN as/IN Madame/NNP la/NNP Duchesse/NNP tells/VBZ you,/IN it/PRP is/VBZ of/IN no/DT use/NN to/TO make/VB your/PRP$ eyes/NNS like/IN boiled/VBN gooseberries,”/NN cried/VBD the/DT dreadful/JJ Asie,/NN shaking/VBG the/DT Countess/NN by/IN the/DT arm./NN “If/NN you/PRP want/VBP to/TO save/VB him,/RB there/EX is/VBZ not/RB a/DT minute/NN to/TO lose./NN He/PRP is/VBZ innocent--I/NN swear/VB it/PRP by/IN my/PRP$ mother’s/NNS bones!”/VBP “Yes,/NN yes,/NN of/IN course/NN he/PRP is!”/VBD cried/VBD the/DT Countess,/NN looking/VBG quite/RB kindly/RB at/IN the/DT dreadful/JJ old/JJ woman./NN “But,”/NNP Asie/NNP this/DT paper.--He/NN will/MD be/VB released/VBN to-morrow;/NN I/CD will/MD answer/VB for/IN it./NNP Now,/NNP get/VB him/PRP out/IN of/IN the/DT scrape,/NN for/IN you/PRP got/VBD him/PRP into/IN it.”/NN “I?”/NN “Yes,/NN you!--You/NN fine/JJ ladies/NNS never/RB have/VBP a/DT son/NN even/RB when/WRB you/PRP own/VBP millions./JJ When/WRB I/PRP allowed/VBD myself/PRP the/DT luxury/NN of/IN brought/VBN him/PRP to/TO this/DT pass----”/NN “Poor/NNP girl!/NNP Did/VBD she/PRP do/VB that!/VB I/PRP love/VBP her!”/NN said/VBD Leontine./NNP “Yes--now!”/NN said/VBD Asie,/NN with/IN freezing/NN irony./NN “She/NN was/VBD a/DT real/JJ beauty;/NN but/CC now,/RB my/PRP$ angel,/NN you/PRP are/VBP better/RBR looking/VBG than/IN she/PRP is.--And/JJ Lucien’s/NNS marriage/NN is/VBZ so/RB Esther’s/NNP house,/VBP the/DT police/NN had/VBD searched/VBN the/DT rooms/NNS at/IN the/DT Quai/NNP Malaquais./NNP “You/NN have/VB your/PRP$ hand/NN on/IN some/DT letters/NNS from/IN the/DT Comtesse/NNP de/IN Serizy,”/NNP said/VBD Carlos/NNP Herrera./NNP “But/NNP I/PRP cannot/VBP imagine/VB why/WRB you/PRP should/MD have/VB almost/RB all/DT Lucien’s/NNS papers,”/VBP he/PRP added,/VB with/IN a/DT smile/NN of/IN overwhelming/JJ irony/NN at/IN the/DT judge./NN Camusot,/NN as/IN he/PRP saw/VBD the/DT smile,/NN understood/VBD the/DT bearing/NN of/IN the/DT word/NN “almost.”/NN “Lucien/NNP de/NNP Rubempre/NNP is/VBZ in/IN custody/NN under/IN suspicion/NN of/IN being/VBG your/PRP$ accomplice,”/NN said/VBD he,/NN watching/VBG to/TO see/VB the/DT effect/NN of/IN this/DT news/NN on/IN his/PRP$ examinee./NN “You/NN have/VBP brought/VBN about/RP a/DT great/JJ misfortune,/NN for/IN he/PRP is/VBZ as/IN innocent/JJ as/IN I/PRP am,”/VBP replied/VBD the/DT sham/NN Spaniard,/NN without/IN betraying/VBG the/DT smallest/JJS agitation./IN “We/NN shall/MD see./VB We/PRP have/VBP not/RB as/RB yet/RB established/VBN your/PRP$ identity,”/NN Camusot/NN observed,/NN surprised/VBD Juge,”/NN she/PRP said,/JJ “if/NN I/PRP could/MD see/VB his/PRP$ chest/NN I/PRP should/MD recognize/VB him/PRP at/IN once.”/NN The/DT magistrate/NN and/CC his/PRP$ clerk/NN could/MD not/RB help/VB the/DT grand/JJ remedy.”/NN The/DT judge/NN kept/VBD a/DT meditative/JJ eye/NN on/IN the/DT prisoner/NN when/WRB the/DT usher/NN and/CC the/DT gendarmes/NNS again/RB took/VBD him/PRP in/IN charge./NN his/PRP$ own/JJ promotion/NN were/VBD secondary/JJ in/IN Camusot’s/NNP mind/NN to/TO his/PRP$ anxiety/NN to/TO know/VB or/CC guess/VB the/DT truth,/NN even/RB if/IN he/PRP should/MD never/RB tell/VB “Have/VB you/PRP any/DT suspicion/NN of/IN where/WRB the/DT money/NN came/VBD from/IN that/IN he/PRP used/VBD to/TO give/VB you?/NN For,/NN if/IN I/PRP am/VBP to/TO believe/VB the/DT evidence/NN of/IN from/IN her.”/NN “It/NN is/VBZ I/PRP who/WP should/MD ask/VB you,/JJ monsieur,/NN whence/NN convicts/NNS get/VBP their/PRP$ money!/NN Jacques/NNP Collin/NNP my/PRP$ father!--Oh,/NN my/PRP$ poor/JJ but/CC the/DT portions/NNS so/RB tightly/RB held/VBN by/IN the/DT antagonists/NNS that/WDT the/DT flame/NN could/MD not/RB touch/VB them./IN The/DT whole/JJ scene/NN had/VBD taken/VBN less/JJR time/NN than/IN is/VBZ needed/VBN to/TO read/VB this/DT account/NN of/IN it./NN “What/NN discussion/NN can/MD have/VB arisen/VBN between/IN you/PRP and/CC Madame/NNP de/IN Serizy?”/NNP the/DT husband/NN of/IN her/PRP$ letters,/NN which/WDT were/VBD not/RB entirely/RB consumed./NN “I/NN shall/MD be/VB compelled,”/NN said/VBD Camusot,/NNP “to/NNP lay/VBD a/DT complaint/NN against/IN Madame/NNP la/DT Comtesse----”/NN “Heh!/NNP What/WP has/VBZ she/PRP done?”/JJ asked/VBD the/DT public/JJ prosecutor,/NN looking/VBG alternately/RB at/IN the/DT lady/NN and/CC the/DT magistrate./NN “I/NN have/VBP “Very/NN true,”/NN said/VBD Camusot,/NNP trying/VBG to/TO recover/VB his/PRP$ dignity./NN “Well,/NN well,/JJ ‘All’s/NNS well/RB that/IN ends/VBZ well,’”/NN said/VBD Monsieur/NNP de/IN Granville./NNP “But,/VB my/PRP$ dear/RB Countess,/NNP you/PRP must/MD not/RB often/RB take/VB such/JJ liberties/NNS with/IN the/DT Law;/NN it/PRP might/MD fail/VB to/TO discern/VB who/WP and/CC what/WP you/PRP “LUCIEN/NNP CHARDON/NNP DE/NN RUBEMPRE.”/NN This/DT Will/NNP was/VBD enclosed/VBN in/IN a/DT letter/NN addressed/VBD to/TO Monsieur/NNP le/DT Comte/NNP de/NNP Granville,/NNP Public/NNP Prosecutor/NNP in/IN the/DT Supreme/NNP Court/NNP at/IN Paris,/NNP as/IN follows:/NN “MONSIEUR/NNP LE/NNP COMTE,--/NNP “I/NN place/NN my/PRP$ Will/NNP in/IN your/PRP$ hands./NN When/WRB you/PRP open/VBP this/DT letter/NN I/PRP shall/MD be/VB no/DT more./JJR In/IN my/PRP$ desire/NN to/TO be/VB free,/JJ I/PRP made/VBD such/JJ cowardly/JJ replies/NNS to/TO Monsieur/NNP Camusot’s/NNP insidious/JJ questions,/NN that,/NN in/IN spite/NN of/IN my/PRP$ innocence,/NN I/NN may/MD find/VB myself/PRP entangled/JJ in/IN a/DT disgraceful/JJ trial./NN Even/RB if/IN I/PRP were/VBD acquitted,/NN a/DT blameless/JJ life/NN would/MD henceforth/RB be/VB impossible/JJ to/TO me/PRP in/IN view/NN of/IN the/DT opinions/NNS of/IN the/DT world./NN “I/NN beg/VBP you/PRP to/TO transmit/VB the/DT enclosed/JJ letter/NN to/TO the/DT Abbe/NNP Carlos/NNP Herrera/NNP without/IN opening/VBG it,/NN and/CC deliver/VB to/TO Monsieur/NNP Camusot/NNP the/DT formal/JJ retraction/NN I/PRP also/RB enclose./VBP “I/NN suppose/VBP no/DT one/NN will/MD dare/VB to/TO break/VB the/DT seal/NN of/IN a/DT packet/NN addressed/VBN to/TO you./VB In/IN this/DT belief/NN I/PRP bid/VBP you/PRP adieu,/JJ offering/NN you/PRP my/PRP$ best/RB respects/VBZ for/IN the/DT last/JJ time,/NN and/CC begging/VBG you/PRP to/TO believe/VB that/IN in/IN writing/VBG to/TO you/PRP I/PRP am/VBP giving/VBG you/PRP a/DT token/JJ of/IN my/PRP$ gratitude/NN for/IN all/DT the/DT kindness/NN you/PRP have/VBP shown/VBN to/TO your/PRP$ deceased/JJ humble/JJ servant,/NN “LUCIEN/NNP DE/NN R.”/NN “_To/NN the/DT Abbe/NNP Carlos/NNP Herrera_./NNP “MY/NN DEAR/NN ABBE,--I/NN have/VBP had/VBN only/RB benefits/NNS from/IN you,/NN and/CC I/PRP have/VBP betrayed/VBN you./JJ This/DT involuntary/JJ ingratitude/NN is/VBZ killing/VBG me,/NN and/CC when/WRB you/PRP read/VBP these/DT lines/NNS I/PRP shall/MD have/VB ceased/VBN to/TO exist./VB You/PRP are/VBP not/RB here/RB now/RB to/TO save/VB me./NN “You/NN had/VBD given/VBN me/PRP full/JJ liberty,/NN if/IN I/PRP should/MD find/VB it/PRP advantageous,/IN to/TO destroy/VB you/PRP by/IN flinging/VBG you/PRP on/IN the/DT ground/NN like/IN a/DT cigar-end;/NN but/CC I/PRP have/VBP ruined/VBN you/PRP by/IN a/DT blunder./CD To/TO escape/VB from/IN a/DT difficulty,/NN deluded/VBN by/IN a/DT clever/JJ question/NN from/IN the/DT examining/VBG judge,/NN your/PRP$ son/NN by/IN adoption/NN and/CC grace/NN went/VBD over/IN to/TO the/DT side/NN of/IN those/DT who/WP aim/VBP at/IN killing/VBG you/PRP at/IN any/DT cost,/NN and/CC insist/VBP on/IN proving/VBG an/DT identity,/NN which/WDT I/PRP know/VBP to/TO be/VB impossible,/JJ between/IN you/PRP and/CC a/DT French/JJ villain./NN All/DT is/VBZ said./IN “Between/NN a/DT man/NN of/IN your/PRP$ calibre/NN and/CC me--me/NN of/IN whom/WP you/PRP tried/VBD to/TO make/VB a/DT greater/JJR man/NN than/IN I/PRP am/VBP capable/JJ of/IN being--no/JJ foolish/JJ sentiment/NN can/MD come/VB at/IN the/DT moment/NN of/IN final/JJ parting./NNP You/PRP the/DT broad/JJ pinions/NNS of/IN that/IN vertigo/NN beating/NN over/IN my/PRP$ head./NN “As/NNS you/PRP have/VBP sometimes/RB said,/JJ there/EX is/VBZ the/DT posterity/NN of/IN Cain/NNP and/CC the/DT posterity/NN of/IN Abel./NNP In/IN the/DT great/JJ human/JJ drama/NN Cain/NNP is/VBZ in/IN opposition./NNP You/PRP are/VBP descended/VBN from/IN Adam/NNP through/IN that/DT line,/NN in/IN which/WDT the/DT devil/NNP still/RB fans/NNS the/DT fire/NN of/IN which/WDT the/DT first/JJ spark/VB was/VBD flung/VBN on/IN Eve./NNP Among/IN the/DT demons/NNS of/IN that/DT pedigree,/NN from/IN time/NN to/TO whose/WP$ vitality/NN demands/VBZ the/DT vast/JJ spaces/NNS they/PRP find/VBP there./RB Such/JJ men/NNS are/VBP as/IN dangerous/JJ as/IN lions/NNS would/MD be/VB in/IN the/DT heart/NN of/IN Normandy;/NN they/PRP must/MD have/VB their/PRP$ prey,/NN and/CC they/PRP devour/VBP common/JJ men/NNS and/CC crop/NN the/DT money/NN of/IN fools./NNP Their/PRP$ sport/NN is/VBZ so/RB dangerous/JJ that/IN at/IN last/JJ they/PRP kill/VBP the/DT humble/JJ dog/NN whom/WP they/PRP have/VBP taken/VBN for/IN a/DT companion/NN and/CC made/VBD an/DT idol/NN of./NN “When/VB it/PRP is/VBZ God’s/JJ will,/NN these/DT mysterious/JJ beings/NNS may/MD be/VB a/DT Moses,/NNP an/DT Attila,/NN Charlemagne,/NN Mahomet,/NN or/CC Napoleon;/NN but/CC when/WRB He/PRP leaves/VBZ a/DT generation/NN of/IN these/DT stupendous/JJ tools/NNS to/TO rust/NN at/IN the/DT bottom/NN of/IN the/DT ocean,/NN they/PRP are/VBP no/RB more/JJR than/IN a/DT Pugatschef,/NN a/DT Fouche,/NN a/DT Louvel,/NN or/CC the/DT Abbe/NNP Carlos/NNP Herrera./NNP Gifted/NNP with/IN immense/JJ power/NN over/IN tenderer/NN souls,/NN they/PRP entrap/VBP them/PRP and/CC mangle/VB them./RB It/PRP is/VBZ grand,/JJ it/PRP is/VBZ fine/JJ --in/NN its/PRP$ way./NNP It/PRP is/VBZ the/DT poisonous/JJ plant/NN with/IN gorgeous/JJ coloring/VBG that/IN fascinates/VBZ children/NNS in/IN the/DT woods./NNP It/PRP is/VBZ the/DT poetry/NN of/IN evil./NNP Men/NNP like/IN you/PRP ought/MD to/TO dwell/VB in/IN caves/NNS and/CC never/RB come/VBN out/IN of/IN them./NNP You/PRP have/VB made/VBN me/PRP live/VB that/DT vast/JJ life,/NN and/CC clasping/VBG her/PRP$ hands./NN “Only/RB to/TO see/VB him--to/JJ see/VBP him!/JJ Oh!/NN I/PRP will/MD do/VB no/DT wrong!/NN But/CC if/IN you/PRP do/VBP not/RB want/VB to/TO see/VB me/PRP die/VB on/IN the/DT spot,/JJ let/VB me/PRP look/VB at/IN Lucien/NNP dead/JJ or/CC living.--Ah,/NN my/PRP$ dear,/NN are/VBP you/PRP here?/RB Choose/VBP between/IN my/PRP$ death/NN and----”/NN She/PRP sank/VBD in/IN a/DT heap./NN “You/NN are/VBP kind,”/JJ she/PRP said;/VBP “I/NN will/MD always/RB love/VB you----”/NN “Carry/NNP her/PRP$ away,”/NN said/VBD Monsieur/NNP de/IN Bauvan./NNP “No,/NN we/PRP will/MD go/VB to/TO Lucien’s/NNP cell,”/NNP said/VBD Monsieur/NNP de/IN Granville,/NNP reading/VBG a/DT purpose/NN in/IN Monsieur/NNP de/IN Serizy’s/NNP wild/JJ looks./NN And/CC he/PRP lifted/VBD up/RP the/DT de/IN Serizy/NNP to/TO the/DT Governor,/NNP “silence/NN as/IN of/IN the/DT grave/JJ about/IN all/DT this.”/IN “Be/NN easy,”/NN replied/VBD the/DT Governor;/NNP “you/NN have/VBP done/VBN the/DT public/JJ prosecutor?”/NN “But,/NNP Monsieur/NNP and/CC Madame/NNP de/IN Serizy?”/NNP cried/VBD the/DT poor/JJ man./NN “Madame/NNP de/IN Serizy/NNP is/VBZ gone/VBN mad,/JJ I/PRP tell/VBP you,/NN and/CC her/PRP$ madness/NN is/VBZ my/PRP$ doing,/NN they/PRP say.”/VBP “Well,/NN if/IN she/PRP is/VBZ out/IN of/IN her/PRP$ mind,/NN O/NN judge/NN devoid/JJ of/IN judgment,”/NN said/VBD Madame/NNP Camusot,/NNP laughing,/NN “she/NN can/MD do/VB you/PRP no/DT harm.--Come,/NN tell/VB me/PRP all/DT the/DT incidents/NNS of/IN the/DT day.”/NN “Bless/JJ me!”/NN said/VBD Camusot,/NNP “just/VB as/IN understand/VB him!/NN If/IN you/PRP are/VBP so/RB deaf,/VB you/PRP will/MD indeed/RB be/VB an/DT examining/VBG judge/NN all/DT your/PRP$ life/NN without/IN any/DT knowledge/NN whatever/WDT of/IN in/IN prison,/NN curiosity/NN is/VBZ the/DT only/JJ goad/NN of/IN these/DT blighted/JJ spirits./NN And/CC Jacques/NNP Collin’s/NNP daring/JJ disguise,/NN kept/VBD up/RP even/RB under/IN the/DT know/VB that/IN Theodore/NNP was/VBD so/RB near/IN the/DT Abbaye,”/NNP said/VBD Jacques/NNP Collin./NNP “I/NNP came/VBD in/IN to/TO save/VB a/DT poor/JJ little/JJ chap/NN who/WP scragged/VBD himself/PRP up/RP with/IN a/DT fierce/JJ look./NN “There/NN comes/VBZ a/DT time/NN when/WRB the/DT world/NN is/VBZ too/RB many/JJ for/IN us!/JJ The/DT beaks/NNS gobble/VBP us/PRP up/RP at/IN last.”/NN The/DT governor/NN of/IN the/DT Conciergerie,/NN informed/VBN of/IN the/DT Spanish/JJ priest’s/NNS weak/JJ state,/NN came/VBD himself/PRP to/TO the/DT prison-yard/JJ to/TO observe/VB him;/NN he/PRP of/IN such/JJ functions,/JJ though/IN hidden/VBN under/IN an/DT appearance/NN of/IN indifference./NN “Oh!/NN Heaven!”/NN cried/VBD Jacques/NNP Collin./NNP “To/NNP be/VB mixed/VBN up/RP with/IN such/JJ drama/NN to/TO watch/VB every/DT morning,/NN and/CC forgets/VBZ everything./NNP The/NNP police,/NNP on/IN the/DT contrary,/NN forgets/VBZ nothing./RB Three/CD months/NNS after/IN this/DT fruitless/JJ inquiry,/NN a/DT girl/NN of/IN the/DT town,/NN whose/WP$ extravagance/NN had/VBD invited/VBN the/DT attention/NN of/IN Bibi-Lupin’s/JJ agents,/NN who/WP watched/VBN her/PRP$ as/IN being/VBG the/DT the/DT muscles/NNS peculiar/JJ to/TO Corsicans,/NNP denoting/VBG that/IN excessive/JJ irritability/NN which/WDT makes/VBZ them/PRP so/RB prompt/VBP to/TO kill/VB in/IN any/DT sudden/JJ squabble./NN Theodore,/NN startled/VBD at/IN the/DT sound/NN of/IN that/DT voice,/NN raised/VBD his/PRP$ head,/NN and/CC at/IN first/RB thought/VBN himself/PRP the/DT victim/NN of/IN a/DT delusion;/NN but/CC as/IN the/DT experience/NN of/IN two/CD months/NNS had/VBD accustomed/VBN him/PRP to/TO the/DT darkness/NN of/IN this/DT stone/NN box,/NN he/PRP looked/VBD at/IN the/DT sham/NN priest,/NN and/CC sighed/VBD old/JJ boss./NN “It/NN is/VBZ really/RB your/PRP$ Jacques;/NN I/PRP am/VBP your/PRP$ confessor,/NN and/CC have/VBP come/VBN to/TO get/VB you/PRP off./VBP Do/VBP not/RB be/VB such/JJ a/DT ninny/NN as/IN to/TO know/VB me;/NN and/CC speak/VBP as/IN if/IN you/PRP were/VBD making/VBG a/DT confession.”/NN He/PRP spoke/VBD with/IN the/DT utmost/JJ rapidity./NN “This/NN young/JJ fellow/NN is/VBZ very/RB much/JJ depressed;/NN he/PRP is/VBZ afraid/JJ to/TO die,/VB he/PRP will/MD confess/VB everything,”/NN said/VBD Jacques/NNP Collin,/NNP addressing/VBG the/DT gendarme./NN Bibi-Lupin/NNP dared/VBD not/RB say/VB a/DT word/NN for/IN fear/NN of/IN being/VBG recognized./VBN “Say/NN something/NN to/TO show/VB me/PRP that/IN you/PRP are/VBP he;/RB you/PRP have/VBP nothing/NN but/CC his/PRP$ voice,”/NN said/VBD Theodore./NNP “You/NN see,/NN poor/JJ boy,/NN he/PRP assures/VBZ me/PRP that/IN he/PRP is/VBZ innocent,”/NN said/VBD Jacques/NNP Collin/NNP to/TO Bibi-Lupin,/NNP who/WP dared/VBD the/DT whole/JJ story,/NN that/IN I/PRP may/MD see/VB what/WP can/MD be/VB done/VBN to/TO save/VB you;/NN make/VB haste,/NNP Jack/NNP Ketch/NNP is/VBZ waiting.”/NN The/DT Corsican/NNP at/IN once/RB it/PRP hardly/RB took/VBD as/RB much/JJ time/NN as/IN it/PRP does/VBZ to/TO read/VB it./NNP Theodore/NNP hastily/RB told/VBD all/PDT the/DT details/NNS of/IN the/DT crime,/NN of/IN which/WDT they/PRP are/VBP waiting/VBG to/TO cut/VB off/RP your/PRP$ hair----”/NN “But/NN I/NN might/MD have/VB been/VBN sent/VBN to/TO spout/VB the/DT wedge.--And/NN that/WDT is/VBZ the/DT way/NN they/PRP judge/VBP you!--and/JJ in/IN Paris/NNP too!”/IN “But/NN how/WRB did/VBD you/PRP do/VBP the/DT job?”/NN asked/VBD _Trompe-la-Mort_./NNP “Ah!/NN there/EX you/PRP are.--Since/NN I/PRP saw/VBD you/PRP I/PRP made/VBD acquaintance/NN with/IN a/DT girl,/NN a/DT Corsican,/NN I/CD met/VBD when/WRB I/PRP came/VBD to/TO Paris.”/NN “Men/NN who/WP are/VBP such/JJ fools/NNS as/IN to/TO love/VB a/DT woman,”/NN cried/VBD Jacques/NNP Collin,/NNP “always/NNS come/VBP to/TO grief/NN that/WDT way./VBD They/PRP are/VBP tigers/NNS on/IN the/DT loose,/NN tigers/NNS who/WP blab/NN and/CC look/VB at/IN themselves/PRP in/IN the/DT glass.--You/NN were/VBD a/DT gaby.”/NN “But----”/NN “Well,/NN what/WDT good/NN did/VBD she/PRP do/VB you--that/JJ curse/NN of/IN a/DT moll?”/NN “That/NN duck/NN of/IN a/DT girl--no/NN taller/JJR than/IN a/DT bundle/NN of/IN firewood,/NN as/IN slippery/JJ as/IN an/DT eel,/NN and/CC as/IN nimble/JJ as/IN a/DT monkey--got/NN in/IN at/IN the/DT top/NN of/IN the/DT oven,/NN and/CC opened/VBD the/DT front/JJ door./NN The/DT dogs/NNS were/VBD well/RB crammed/VBN with/IN balls,/NN and/CC as/IN dead/JJ as/IN herrings./NN I/PRP settled/VBD the/DT two/CD women./NN Then/RB when/WRB I/PRP got/VBD the/DT swag,/NN Ginetta/NNP locked/VBD the/DT door/NN and/CC got/VBD out/RP again/RB by/IN the/DT oven.”/NN “Such/VB a/DT clever/JJ dodge/VBP deserves/VBZ life,”/NN said/VBD all/DT our/PRP$ wits,”/NN and/CC Jacques/NNP Collin/NNP eyed/VBD Theodore/NNP with/IN a/DT flashing/VBG glance/NN of/IN contempt./NN “But/NN you/PRP were/VBD not/RB there!”/RB said/VBD the/DT depth/NN of/IN our/PRP$ heart./NNP The/DT priest/NN with/IN his/PRP$ life/NN given/VBN to/TO God,/NNP the/DT soldier/NN with/IN a/DT thousand/CD deaths/NNS for/IN his/PRP$ country’s/NNS sake,/VBP Paris,/NNP in/IN our/PRP$ home/NN district,/NN an/DT innocent/JJ man/NN should/MD be/VB executed!”/JJ “He/NN is/VBZ an/DT escaped/VBN convict,”/NN said/VBD Monsieur/NNP Camusot,/NNP diffidently./NNP reconstruction,”/NN said/VBD Monsieur/NNP de/IN Granville./NN “But/NN it/PRP is/VBZ an/DT outlay/NN of/IN twenty/CD to/TO thirty/CD million/CD francs!/NN Just/RB try/VB asking/VBG the/DT Chambers/NNS for/IN thirty/CD millions/NNS for/IN the/DT more/RBR decent/JJ accommodation/NN of/IN Justice.”/NN The/DT sound/NN of/IN many/JJ footsteps/NNS and/CC a/DT clatter/NN of/IN arms/NNS fell/VBD on/IN their/PRP$ ear./JJ It/PRP would/MD be/VB Jacques/NNP Collin./NNP The/DT public/JJ prosecutor/NN assumed/VBD a/DT mask/NN of/IN gravity/NN that/WDT hid/VBD the/DT man./NN Camusot/NNP imitated/VBD his/PRP$ chief./NN The/DT office-boy/JJ opened/VBD the/DT door,/NN and/CC Jacques/NNP Collin/NNP came/VBD in,/RB quite/RB calm/JJ and/CC unmoved./JJ “You/NN wished/VBD to/TO speak/VB to/TO me,”/VB said/VBD Monsieur/NNP de/IN Granville./NNP “I/NNP am/VBP ready/JJ to/TO listen.”/NN “Monsieur/NNP le/DT Comte,/NNP I/PRP am/VBP Jacques/NNP Collin./NNP I/PRP surrender!”/VBP Camusot/NNP started;/VBD the/DT public/JJ prosecutor/NN was/VBD immovable./VBN “As/NNS you/PRP may/MD suppose,/VB I/PRP have/VB my/PRP$ reasons/NNS for/IN doing/VBG this,”/NN said/VBD Jacques/NNP Collin,/NN with/IN an/DT as/IN I/PRP am/VBP does/VBZ not/RB take/VB the/DT trouble/NN to/TO lie--you/NN know/VBP that./IN What/WP I/PRP have/VBP told/VBN you/PRP is/VBZ the/DT truth.”/NN “To/NN you,/NN Jacques/NNP Collin,/NNP me/PRP your/PRP$ word;/NN it/PRP will/MD be/VB enough.”/JJ Monsieur/NNP Granville/NNP drew/VBD himself/PRP up/RP with/IN offended/JJ pride./NN “I/NN hold/NN in/IN my/PRP$ hand/NN the/DT honor/NN of/IN Maufrigneuse.--And/NN what/WDT letters!--I/NN tell/VB you,/NNP Monsieur/NNP le/FW Comte,/NNP prostitutes,/NN when/WRB they/PRP write/VBP letters,/NN assume/VB a/DT style/NN of/IN sentiment;/NN instincts./NN To/TO my/PRP$ mind/NN a/DT woman/NN has/VBZ no/DT beauty/NN who/WP is/VBZ not/RB like/VB a/DT man./NN “So/NN your/PRP$ smart/JJ duchesses,/NN who/WP are/VBP men/NNS in/IN brains/NNS only,/JJ write/VB masterpieces./NN Oh!/NN they/PRP are/VBP splendid/JJ from/IN beginning/VBG to/TO end,/VB like/IN Piron’s/NNS famous/JJ ode!----”/NN “Indeed!”/NN “Would/NN you/PRP like/VBP to/TO and/CC went/VBD away./IN “Beg/NN of/IN the/DT Prince/NNP to/TO request/VB the/DT King/NNP to/TO grant/VB me/PRP ten/CD minutes’/JJ audience/NN at/IN about/RB half-past/JJ two,”/NN added/VBD plays/VBZ me/PRP false/JJ dies/VBZ within/IN a/DT year;/NN on/IN the/DT other/JJ hand,/NN those/DT who/WP are/VBP true/JJ to/TO me/PRP have/VBP nothing/NN to/TO fear/VB from/IN me./FW I/PRP am/VBP staunch/VB through/IN thick/JJ and/CC thin,/JJ and/CC would/MD die/VB without/IN saying/VBG a/DT word/NN that/WDT would/MD compromise/VB anybody/NN I/PRP wish/VBP well/RB to./IN Stick/NNP to/TO me/PRP as/IN a/DT soul/NN sticks/VBZ to/TO the/DT Devil,/NN and/CC you/PRP will/MD find/VB the/DT benefit/NN of/IN it./NNP I/PRP promised/VBD your/PRP$ poor/JJ Auguste/NNP that/IN you/PRP should/MD be/VB happy;/JJ he/PRP wanted/VBD to/TO make/VB you/PRP a/DT rich/JJ woman,/NN and/CC he/PRP got/VBD scragged/VBN for/IN your/PRP$ sake./NN “Don’t/NN cry;/NN listen/VBP to/TO me./VB No/DT one/NN in/IN the/DT world/NN knows/VBZ that/IN you/PRP were/VBD mistress/NN to/TO a/DT convict,/NN to/TO the/DT murderer/NN they/PRP choked/VBD off/RP last/JJ Saturday;/NN and/CC I/PRP shall/MD never/RB tell./VB honest/JJ woman/NN if/IN you/PRP can./VBP In/IN return/NN for/IN peace/NN and/CC quiet,/NN I/PRP only/RB ask/VB you/PRP to/TO serve/VB me/PRP now/RB and/CC then,/RB me,/NN and/CC any/DT one/CD I/PRP letter-boxes,/NN one/CD of/IN my/PRP$ porters’/NN lodges,/NN one/CD of/IN my/PRP$ messengers,/NN neither/CC more/JJR nor/CC less./JJR “You/NN are/VBP too/RB red-haired;/JJ Auguste/NNP and/CC I/PRP used/VBD to/TO call/VB you/PRP la/DT Rousse;/NNP you/PRP can/MD keep/VB that/DT name./NN My/PRP$ aunt,/VB an/DT old-clothes/JJ dealer/NN at/IN the/DT Temple,/NN who/WP will/MD come/VB and/CC see/VB husband,/NN and/CC be/VB very/RB useful/JJ to/TO you.”/VB And/CC thus/RB the/DT bargain/NN was/VBD struck,/VBN a/DT diabolical/JJ compact/NN like/IN that/DT which/WDT had/VBD for/IN so/RB long/JJ for/IN recruiting./NN In/IN about/RB 1821/CD Jacques/NNP Collin/NNP found/VBD la/NNP Rousse/NNP a/DT husband/NN in/IN the/DT person/NN of/IN the/DT chief/NN shopman/NN under/IN a/DT rich/JJ wholesale/JJ tin/NN merchant./NN This/DT head-clerk,/NN having/VBG purchased/VBN his/PRP$ master’s/NNS house/NN of/IN business,/NN was/VBD now/RB a/DT prosperous/JJ man,/VB the/DT father/NN of/IN afternoon!”/NN cried/VBD Jacques/NNP Collin./NNP “Well,/VB it/PRP is/VBZ a/DT notion!/JJ We/PRP shall/MD end/VB our/PRP$ days/NNS as/IN honest/JJ folks/NNS in/IN a/DT fine/NN property/NN and/CC a/DT delightful/JJ climate--in/JJ Touraine.”/NN “What/NN was/VBD to/TO become/VB of/IN me?/NN Lucien/NNP has/VBZ taken/VBN my/PRP$ soul/NN with/IN him,/NN and/CC all/DT my/PRP$ joy/NN in/IN life./NN I/PRP a/DT police/NN agent./NNP And/CC so/RB long/RB as/IN I/PRP have/VBP a/DT man/NN to/TO devour,/VB I/PRP shall/MD still/RB feel/VB alive.--The/JJ profession/NN a/DT man/NN follows/VBZ in/IN the/DT eyes/NNS of/IN the/DT world/NN is/VBZ a/DT mere/JJ sham;/NN the/DT reality/NN is/VBZ in/IN the/DT idea!”/NN he/PRP added,/JJ striking/JJ his/PRP$ forehead.--“How/NN much/RB have/VBP we/PRP left/VBD in/IN the/DT cash-box?”/JJ he/PRP asked./IN “Nothing,”/NNP said/VBD his/PRP$ aunt,/NN dismayed/VBN by/IN the/DT man’s/NNS tone/NN and/CC manner./NN “I/NN gave/VBD you/PRP all/DT I/PRP had/VBD for/IN past./VBP That/DT boy/NN had/VBD all/DT the/DT pals’/NN blunt,/NN our/PRP$ savings,/NN and/CC all/DT old/JJ Nourrisson’s.”/NN “Making----?”/NN “Five/JJ hundred/CD and/CC sixty/CD thousand.”/IN “We/NN may/MD easily/RB replace/VB him./NNP You/PRP really/RB are--allow/VB me/PRP to/TO praise/VB you/PRP to/TO your/PRP$ face--you/JJ are,/NN on/IN my/PRP$ word/NN of/IN honor,/NN a/DT magnificent/JJ man.”/NN “No,/NN no,/NN I/PRP bow/VBP to/TO your/PRP$ superiority,”/NN replied/VBD Corentin,/NNP assuming/VBG the/DT air/NN of/IN a/DT professional/JJ joker,/NN as/IN if/IN he/PRP said,/VBP “If/NN you/PRP mean/VBP humbug,/JJ by/IN all/DT means/NNS humbug!/VBP I/PRP have/VB everything/NN at/IN my/PRP$ command,/NN while/IN you/PRP are/VBP single-handed,/NN so/RB to/TO speak.”/VB “Oh!/NN Oh!”/NN said/VBD Jacques/NNP Collin./NNP “And/VB you/PRP were/VBD very/RB near/JJ winning/VBG the/DT day!”/NN said/VBD Corentin,/NNP noticing/VBG the/DT exclamation./NN “You/NN are/VBP quite/RB the/DT most/RBS extraordinary/JJ man/NN I/PRP ever/RB met/VBD in/IN my/PRP$ life,/NN and/CC I/PRP have/VBP seen/VBN many/JJ very/RB extraordinary/JJ men,/NN for/IN those/DT I/PRP have/VBP to/TO work/NN with/IN me/PRP are/VBP all/DT remarkable/JJ for/IN daring/JJ and/CC bold/JJ scheming./NN “I/NN was,/NN for/IN my/PRP$ sins,/NN very/RB intimate/JJ with/IN the/DT late/JJ Duc/NN d’Otranto;/NN I/PRP have/VBP worked/VBN for/IN Louis/NNP XVIII./NNP when/WRB he/PRP was/VBD on/IN the/DT throne;/NN and,/NN when/WRB he/PRP was/VBD exiled,/NN for/IN the/DT Emperor/NNP and/CC for/IN the/DT Directory./NNP for/IN Monsieur/NNP de/IN Nucingen?/NNP I/PRP don’t/VBP know/VB where/WRB to/TO get/VB them/PRP when/WRB I/PRP want/VBP them.”/IN “Monsieur,/NN monsieur,/NN you/PRP overpower/VBP me,”/NN said/VBD round/NN is/VBZ the/DT forbidden/VBN land,/VB you/PRP shall/MD not/RB live/VB there!’/RB and/CC it/PRP subjects/VBZ the/DT convict/VB to/TO the/DT watchfulness/NN of/IN the/DT police./NNP Do/VBP you/PRP think/VB that/IN life/NN is/VBZ possible/JJ under/IN such/JJ conditions?/JJ To/TO live,/VB the/DT convict/VB must/MD work,/VB for/IN he/PRP does/VBZ not/RB come/VB out/IN of/IN prison/NN other/JJ ways/NNS including/VBG checks,/JJ online/NN payments/NNS and/CC credit/NN card/NN donations./NN To/TO donate,/VB please/VB visit:/JJ http://pglaf.org/donate/NN Section/NN 5./LS General/NNP
